name: parsec.serial-tracev-simmedium
guest-init: prepareGuest.sh /opt/parsec --suite parsec -v threads=1 -v arch=serial.riscv-64 --precmd firesim-start-trigger --postcmd firesim-end-trigger --input simmedium

jobs.name: blackscholes
jobs.guest-init: prepareGuest.sh /opt/parsec --wrapper time --wrapper pmapelf -v threads=1 -v arch=serial.riscv-64 --precmd firesim-start-trigger --postcmd firesim-end-trigger --input simmedium -- blackscholes
